title: A Declaration of His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax and his covncell of warre, on behalfe of themselves and the whole army, shewing the grounds of their present advance towards the city of London.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
publisher: Printed by J. Harris, and H. Hills ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Item at 1503:1 incorrectly identified as D580.
